website_summaries.verdict: Sony's SMP-N200 streaming-media box packs a lot of functionality, but it's hampered by a subpar user interface.
pros: Sony's SMP-N200 streaming-media box supports Netflix, Hulu Plus, Amazon Instant, Vudu, and Pandora
It's also DLNA-compliant, so it can stream media from your home network, including Xvid and MKV files
The external design is also considerably improved over last year's, especially the new simple remote
cons: The user interface is poorly designed for a streaming-media box, especially when browsing movies via cover art that is too small to read
Cover art isn't supported at all when browsing music on your home network
The video search doesn't hit any of the services you want, and the included browser is frustrating to use

customer_reviews.title: worked great since I didn't have cable
customer_reviews.text: This thing was totally worth the price. Bought it over 2 years ago, worked great since I didn't have cable, but I wanted to be able to watch netflix in my bedroom from the internet. Too bad that youtube app won't play on it anymore because google changed their terms, or something to that effect. But it works for netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Why Not

customer_reviews.title: Abandoned by SONY quickly but at least Netflix still works
customer_reviews.text: The box works for the main purpose I bought it - to provide Netflix to an older TV. Nothing great but it does the job. If you can buy a more modern device go for it instead of this because it seems as if SONY already discontinued supporting this player about a year after they came out with it which is sort of pathetic. There have been no network updates since 2012 and if you try to do it manually you get an error message. Who knows, someday SONY may pull the plug completely. All of the little changes Netflix made to their service over the last year are missing here, no multiple accounts, no subtitles.
customer_reviews.author: V. Fazzi

customer_reviews.title: Works poorly with Netflix
customer_reviews.text: I needed a streamer with component outputs for my old HDTV. This was the only one I found, and it works great. Setup was easy and picture is outstanding. Update: I have been having more and more problems with this streamer playing Netflix. The feeds bog down and become unplayable. Searches on the internet reveal this problem is peculiar to Sony streamers, including their BlueRay and DVD players, TVs and gaming consoles. Sony apparently reroutes all streams through their routers, slowing down everything. So, on second thought, avoid at all costs!
customer_reviews.author: Andean

customer_reviews.title: Great little media box
customer_reviews.text: This little media box does almost everything one could hope for in a tiny little box. It does Netflix and Amazon Prime Instant Video and has few issues with those other than the somewhat difficult to use interface. It is usable though so I don't have much issue with that. One problem I have is that I have a DLNA media server with some movies on it in XVid format with ac3 audio. This box doesn't seem to handle these files which is disappointing. Especially because these files work on my PS3 in another room. I expected similar compatibility with this box as the PS3 because they are both Sony products.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F.

customer_reviews.title: No Subtitles - Closed Captions
customer_reviews.text: I bought the streaming player - only problem is It wont show the subtitles (closed captions) on netflix content - unless you are watching a foreign movie. when I spoke to the sony representative - this is what they had to say -- The Sony Network Media Players does not support Line 21 data which is the reason why the closed caption/subtitle may not be displayed for the particular movie. Bottom line If you can live without closed captions its the best bet - but if you are someone like me who NEEDS closed captions - then that's something to ponder about? - Hari.
customer_reviews.author: Hari

customer_reviews.title: Sony Media Player
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my old WD media player and it does the job well. Sony has added extra services inside, plus with Sony PC you can do some extra stuff on this player (you can also add an app to your iOS device, not sure about Android, but probably the same). WiFi is included, but I am using network cable (simply because I have available port nearby). However, I did test WiFi, just to see it is working, and streaming was good. Media player is connecting to my Seaate BlackArmor NAS without any problems - in other words I am not streaming from a PC. Most of my stuff are MP4...
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Vojvodic

customer_reviews.title: Great Media Streamer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product that would allow me to stream my local media files along with accessing Streaming services such as Hulu, Netflix, and Amazon On Demand. This product lived up to all expectations. The navigation menus are easy to use, and quite intuitive. The BraviaSync feature is great for those who already have Bravia TV's as it makes using a single remote seamless and easy. I give it four stars as there is always room for improvement in adding additional streaming services such as ESPN, MLB, NBA, and BigTen2Go
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Sony streaming media player
customer_reviews.text: I love my streamer, although I don't think it is connected properly. I have gone out and purchase to broadband wireless routers and still have to run up and down the stairs before it will play. Looking for someone to come into my home and instlal it properly. I am beyond pleased to be able to view all of the old television programs from day one of their series. Recommended it to most of my friends who enjoy movies and old televsion programming
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M. Young

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Install was very easy. The interface is great, (SONY interface like the PS3) I've only had this for a day, but some of the other reviews or more technical, and help me make the decision to purchase. Small, wireless, HDMI, USB port is on the side, it should be in front. Upon install is found software upgrade and installed no problem. The different aps are awesome! SO many options, way more than I can use but finding some nice ones. Netflix, Billabong, Crackle, hulu free for 3 months, pandora, to name a few. Streamlined from my wireless laptop to this sony player no problems. Sony product like this for 50 dollars, can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jasen V. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a week and so far so good, the device is working very good and fits my needs, and I think that is mostly the main reason of bad scores, the device is not for everyone but which one is it? particularly I love the DNLA function, it reads many formats and loads everything very fast from my Seagate. using the android and ipod touch apps typing for searching becomes better than using the remote, of course it is not perfect but I haven't found any other device with all the functions that I want in one (netflix, hulu plus, DNLA, and last but not least USB!!!)
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY TV IS BETTER
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 1 month now and its great, i can watfch netflix you tube etc even has a few hollywood movies free on crackle, all from my bed. Will be purchasing a wireless keyboard to use with it so i can surf the net too. LOVE SONY PRODUCTS. Hooked up to my wifi no problems streaming is amazing, thinking of banishing cable FOREVER !! 02/16/2014 UPDATE still works great, did cut the cable cord after using for 3 months, no complaints, use the hulu and Netflix and of course free amazon prime movies, never missed cable and still love this box
customer_reviews.author: APPLE2011

customer_reviews.title: Very good for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to watch Amazon videos and listen to Slacker radio. I found it very easy to set up and use, but I had to knock one star off for a couple minor complaints. 1) You have to type codes from all over the place to link your player to whatever you are watching on it. 2) I can't see the graphical movie and TV choices very well when I am looking for something to watch (on a 46" TV). I read the same comments on earlier reviews before I bought this, so I was kind of expecting it. Other than that, the picture and sound are great and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Working Joe

customer_reviews.title: What a great buy here.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that i was very worried about this purchase. I have never purchased anything refurbished before now. This has been a WONDERFUL addition to the bedroom entertainment center. It streams Netflix and YouTube like a champ. This is worth every penny. Forgot to mention that you can hook up ur smartphone and use it as a remote control. Really makes searching for content a breeze. Will even allow web browsing with this device. BUY WITH CONFIDENCE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zayas

customer_reviews.title: Died in 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Did not last more than 2 years. It was nice while it lasted but didn’t last long. I didn’t even use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: John2123

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for streaming video. We are totally hooked on Amazon Instant video and even on a 4mpbs connection, this works very well. It would be better with a keyboard, but the free Android remote control app provides that as well. This is the older model and is not available from Sony anymore. Their new model appears to be Android, but is more than 2x the price. This does exactly what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great Streaming Device!
customer_reviews.text: This little device is so easy to use and it's very easy to set up. The pictures are clear as a bell--great HD. It has just about everything available to link to concerning streaming content. I bought this one for my bedroom TV and I've had no problem on the wireless connection even tho it's somewhat farther away from my wireless router. It's also reasonable in price!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hood

customer_reviews.title: this is AWESOME -- much better than Roku
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item on Amazon, and received within 2 days. Out of the box, the SONY SMP-N200 required some initial setup, but once you are done with setting up your accounts it was a breeze to play videos on netflix, amazon videos, and youtube. I like the fact that this low cost device can deliver 1080p streaming to my TV effortlessly. Never locked up on me, and never had any issues. So far seems like a great purchase! I recommend this over Roku for anyone out there looking to get started with network streaming devices.
customer_reviews.author: curiocity

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a refurbished Sony SMP-N200. It arrived in a Sony factory recertified box and looks brand new. It works great for watching Netflix. Also tried Crackle and that works great too. For being internet video on a 42" plasma, the image quality is suprisingly good, even though I just used the included A/V cable because i didnt want to spend extra on a HDMI cable. Used ethernet cable instead of wireless connection and videos from both Netflix and Crackel play flawlessly. The refurb was only $26.99 (plus a rediculous $12.31 for shipping) so for the money this is a way better deal than the other Netflix players I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Hills

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was going to get an Apple TV, however I chose this product instead. I'm glad I did because this has everything. I use it to watch Amazon Prime, HuluPlus, Netflix, youtube, Pandora and browse the internet. There's seriously so much you can do with it. Theres also an app that allows your Iphone to be the controller which is really cool. I ended up buying 2 more for family for Christmas gifts. They love them as well.
customer_reviews.author: cmguido

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I use this streamer for both Internet media and my own home media server. Even over wireless is does a good job with movies and music. Navigation is a little cumbersome but easy to get used to. Seems to have some streaming issues with Netflix that the roku it replaced did not (could be a wireless issue). Other than that, it meets my needs above expectations.
customer_reviews.author: DAymond

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up - just take your time and follow the instructions. Nice looking. I set it on its side and it just looks like a book on the shelf. Works great and cost half the price of my old Western Digital (which didn't even have a built in Wi-Fi adapter, you had to plug in a separate USB adapter.) I like this Sony Media Player so much that I just ordered 2 more - One for upstairs and one for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K.

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: i was told by a friend about this Sony Media player, that i was going to be able to get wifi on it, i'm really happy that i purchased this item, we been able to watch a lots of movie and children carton, this was a great decision buying it, we couldn't asked for anything better, way to go guys, keep it up the good work you're the best, and the price was great, thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: rafael

customer_reviews.title: Good Streaming Player with easy controls
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item online to primarily stream from Netflix& Yupp tv. The streaming quality is good with easy controls. Few features would have liked on this item are - a. Every time we switch on the TV have to go through the selection process to reach the required channel/streaming content. Would be good if we could set up a short cut key for this. b. The Home button is very close to the return key and slightly elevated as well. We have pressed the Home key mistakenly multiple times and have had to follow set 1 all over again. The video quality and speed are excellent. Would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Vishwa

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Player!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi I just purchased this streaming player and at first was a little skeptical about it, but let me tell you now that I have it I'm so glad I bough it. This thing works great and I can now stop buying dvds and I can enjoy my subscription with netflix that and i also like the fact that this thing has a web browser and even though it does not have flash on it is really cool and I can check out my facebook from my tv and the youtube app also works great. All in all is making my life a lot easier...
customer_reviews.author: Sonictek

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a couple months now and seems to be working pretty well. I chose this one because it seemed to be the one that fit all my needs for its intended purpose. Somewhat easy installation and set-up, if you know how to hook up a dvd player...just takes a bit of programming but that's fairly simple as well. Since the one I bought was refurbished, I also bought the Square Trade Warranty, just in case...seemed like a cheaper alternative in case anything happened to it.
customer_reviews.author: penit114

customer_reviews.title: Streaming media player
customer_reviews.text: This little box is very cool! The wi fi connects the tv to the internet so we can watch netflix, hulu, etc... and we can pick up anything on the computer as well. Works great and has a tiny footprint 6"x6". This is our second one, we have one on another tv in the house that's worked great for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: wonderflight

customer_reviews.title: Running with Serviio off my media server.
customer_reviews.text: This works great and does the job. All the services work as advertised but I would prefer a better user interface. It takes a lot of clicks to get a movie or show going. Plus, the on screen keyboard is terrible. Works well for DLNA. Streaming from my media server works well with both Serviio and Plex.
customer_reviews.author: Horsetangle

customer_reviews.title: I've got 2
customer_reviews.text: These work very well for my main purpose - to play my ripped dvds across my network. I use servio server software, and mkv for the rips. this works great for video, but i have not tried it for music, as this is just connected to my flat screen, and I also have a roku box for Netflix and Amazon video. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great...except Netflix icons are too small to read
customer_reviews.text: Plays every video format that I have tried. Netflix icons are very small and are virtually unusable. Hopefully, an update might change that condition. There is an app for Apple iphone and Ipad. It is called "media Remote" It is listed under I phone, but I installed it on my ipad and it works great. When in search mode you can use the keyboard on your ipad/phone instead of the laborious hen peck method used on the screen with the remote control. I had a Roko box which I sent back. This is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Bodenhamer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: All I wanted was to play Netflix and movies/music from my computer to my TV. This thing solved the problem for 48 dollars, and it works great. There are way more streaming channels on this than I'll ever use. Make sure to download the remote for your smart phone and the "homestream" Sony software, which allows streaming MKV and such through DLNA. Works like a charm for all my videos on my computer, most of which are h.264 mkv files. The remote is fast and responsive, truly impressive for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Burton

customer_reviews.title: Streaming Players
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several Blu-ray, streaming, players and all had major issues with being slow, crashing, and quality. In addition, the services available were very limited often being 3 or 4 services only. The Sony is amazing! A huge list of services available and updating all the time, not a single crash or hang, fast, and easy to use. It IS what I have been looking for all along in streaming video. I received $30 off so the deal was well worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: The Col

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Media Player
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 others (WD and an off brand media player). They were huge let downs. This is the best by far. It works perfect with my surround sound and delivers a 1080 resolution video. The remote is great, where the others were just a piece of garbage. This is a BUY.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilkow

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit and it has everything you need to stream Netflix, Amazon and more. Wifi is the best also a smooth remote that is really handy! This is a must have for serious movie watchers, including the ability to stream 3D movies as well. Cdrive
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This makes it so much easier to keep all of my movies in one place. A hard drive. That means no more video tapes, or DVD's and it plays beautifully. It's also easy to hook up to Netflix with no additional charges. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: The best streaming player solving my need
customer_reviews.text: I like the streaming layer with all the features and various apps it has. It supports various video formats and just plug the USB. Youtube is my favourite app and it best solves my need. The wifi streaming is perfect. The only problem i see with this is to operate the keyboard using remote. If you have a smart phone, sony has the smart app which can be used as remote thru the app. This is wonderful. I really like the app on my iPhone. The worth steaming player for the price and definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sumitranandan

customer_reviews.title: Best Streaming Media Player
customer_reviews.text: It's a very user friendly device, wired/WiFi, 720P/1080P, Manual SSID, no credit card registration, movie genre, DVD player buttons on remote, a power button, a beefy power supply... It's very easy to setup and great video and audio quality. It has Amazon Prime and Netflix. It's the best streaming media player for $48. I wish I could add one more star to the rating.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This Item Worked Just As Described. It Picked Up My Wifi right away. I got this to watch Netflix on my TV Instead of computer/phone and it shows up nicely and does it's job. don't try to surf the Web on this thing though because the browser isn't the best. it's a little hard to see the icons on the TV, but if you have a smartphone.get the media remote app and preview it on your phone! it works like a charm, I like it.I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy b

customer_reviews.text: I watch Netflex, Amazon and Youtube with this magic box, I have a Samsung LCD TV 46" connected to it via HDMI, image quality is very good, sound is good as well. Sometimes the streaming breaks, and I may have to restart the movie all over. On the other hand, if you stop watching a movie or a show, you'd have the option to resume from where you stopped earlier.
customer_reviews.author: MTH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Device "Buy Now"
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent device for watching video on a NAS box or computer. I have a apple tv and roku, but I prefer this device because of its DLNA support and ability to play video files from the usb port. I have 3 of these devices, and I am extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: pman36607

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Order came in very fast and the hook-up and installation was easy. I was watching hulu the same night through this device. Sony has done it again. Great product and the price was nice ($69). I highly recommend. Now I don't have to miss my tv shows. Make the purchase, you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Latoya MG

customer_reviews.title: Sony SMP-N200
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this player a month ago. I previously was attempting to stream media through a Panasonic Blueray player with no success. I have this player ethernet connected and I have no problems streaming HD movies via Amazon Prime. I have not tried the WIFI so I can't speak to that part of the player. My internet connection averages 4.5 to 5.1 Mbps.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: We ditched the dish and went to using only a digital antenna and this streaming device. It works very well. It is quick and offers many different avenues to watch tv. Also very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Nixon72

customer_reviews.title: Great Roku alternative
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a bedroom as a roku alternative (I do have a roku in one room). For $50 it is a great HD streaming media player, had no issues hooking it up to my wireless network, connected to Amamzon VoD and it streamed beautifully. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I was looking for. It navigates exactly like the ps3 (which I am familiar with). Pros: -Good menus/navigation -Small but very functional remote -Easy to set up Cons: -Netflix app on this is annoying but you get used to it -No Xfinity or silverlight -Wifi can be a bit annoying sometimes, requires reset (this is what knocked a star)
customer_reviews.author: boarder4710

customer_reviews.title: It has Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use, It connects to Netflix and Amazon, Sony and others. But I only use Amazon. And it works great. I can't see enough advantage to go to ROKU. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: tomnchrist

customer_reviews.title: Great streamer for great price!
customer_reviews.text: I did my homework and read previous reviews on this product. It does everything it said it would. Lots of free things to start. I have Netflix on my WII but couldn't watch in other rooms, didn't want to pay the price for a smart TV right now. It also got Amazon Prime and can now watch more. The instructions where easy to follow, had it set up in about 15 minutes, and I'm a grandmother. Well worth my money, time, and effort!
customer_reviews.author: Dellie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent media player
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on a few levels--quality of stream is fine, very responsive, but also the remote works very well for what could be a most cumbersome part of the process--that is, entering the name of the show/movie/video you want to stream. We had problems with other players, and certainly with other remotes, but this item, especially for the price, is 100% recommended!
customer_reviews.author: H. Gillman

customer_reviews.title: Great streamer for the money
customer_reviews.text: This streamer works great for me at this price point. The only other thing I can compare the Sony SMP N 200 to is my Vizio DVD player for streaming and this thing blows that out of the water...I would recommend this product...
customer_reviews.author: alan k

customer_reviews.title: Sony had done better
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Freezes up all the time. Remote doesn't work. Does have good integration with other Sony remotes and products
customer_reviews.author: Coffemike86

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect wirelessly. I only wish I can sync it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect wirelessly. I only wish I can sync it to my YouTube app on my phone. Otherwise, this thing pretty much makes dumb tvs smart.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: did almost everything I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This little box is terrific for the price. I was looking for a work around for an internet connection to our Sony TV which had been fried by lightning and this does that and more. The only thing I'd ask is for flash player compatibility, either I haven't figured that out yet or it's not part of the device. Love how it controls the TV just by powering on the box.
customer_reviews.author: jet cm

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my Sony Streamer
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this unit, I had the Netgear model NVS200, this is a FAR better product, the OS is more stable, and it there are more options for video and music. I use it almost every night now. Great buy, great price.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Fav

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He loves it! It does more than he expected. It is high quality, the picture is perfect. I would highly recomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Morehouse

customer_reviews.title: If you love waiting for shows to load and constantly resetting the wireless settings then this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: The player started out being great and I really enjoyed it. The apps were ok - the choice of adding apps pretty much non-existent. But I wasn't interested in choice, as along as Netflix, Hulu, Pandora and Amazon were available. Then after about 6 months I noticed that it was extremely slow at loading and streaming shows. After a while, it just stopped connecting to my network. I tried troubleshooting for why it wouldn't connect but finally I just gave up. This, of course, happened 13 months after I purchased it so the warranty was gone. I've since purchased the Roku LT and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this player! No problems with set-up or streaming. The one downside is the small size of the screen shots when you are trying to pick a movie. They are very hard to see. Still a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: JazzieJJ

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: What a great streaming device.. Works just fine with my samsung tv, controlling it with the tv remote control!! :) It comes with THREE MONTHS FREE Hulu subscription & 1 month free netflex if u r not a member yet.. The youtube works great also, I logged it to my account & I watch the play-lists that i presat.. I have it now for few months now..Many more apps to discover yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Israa

customer_reviews.title: Great Streaming Player and better pricing than others I've looked at
customer_reviews.text: Works great in extra room where we don't have Bluray. Functions better on WiFi than any SmartTV I've used. Easy to set up and have not had any problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: s s m

customer_reviews.title: Great small media player.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this device to connect an old 27" TV w/o WiFi or HDMI. The SMP-N200 has component and composite. Most DVD and Bluray players come now with HDMI only. I've used this moslty to watch Netflix on my Samsung 27" TV (12 years old !)
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo Antezana

customer_reviews.title: goosd for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It turns my very old TV into smart TV. It have and it plays WMA and AVI files without any issue. Only some of the VDO files I can not fast forward some of the video files. good buy for $60
customer_reviews.author: Raja

customer_reviews.title: pretty good streamer
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this machine originally,as I had some trouble registering it with Netflix, but once I tried the code a few times it went ok. Everything else about it went well for hooking it up to wifi and such.
customer_reviews.author: wynne

customer_reviews.title: This little unit works very well. We use it ...
customer_reviews.text: This little unit works very well. We use it for streaming Netflix movies. Have never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product and works really well, my tv went out shortly after buying this and I replaced it with a smart tv, and now I don't use it much
customer_reviews.author: crusher

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I Wanted Netflix On My TV, I Had Tried Previously By Hooking My Phone Direct To My TV And It Didnt Work. This Was A Quick Cheap Solution To Make That Happen.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Good device and service
customer_reviews.text: Really good device and perfect service. I loved this product it helped me get redof all those wires and devices and put it in one device. It' will change ur experience .
customer_reviews.author: Khalid aljamei

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth interface like ps or psp. Streams from nas well. Like it
customer_reviews.author: Gamers

customer_reviews.title: perfect.
customer_reviews.text: perfect for people who are use to sonys setup, and displays. best product for the price sure beats the battery eating wii that i use to use on my porch to watch Netflix
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set-up if you follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Easy to set-up if you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: frizb

customer_reviews.title: Best Media Streaming Player by far!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. I had it working in less then 10 Minutes. It was purchased to replace a Roku Player which constantly freezes and was very slow to respond. This Player works very fast and never freezes, the only thing I miss is the friendly User Interface on the Roku Player. It works great with Hulu+, Netflix, Amazon VOD and Sony. The picture Quality is excellent and the Sound is acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Bernd Reitinger

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Another xmas gift wife was streaming with a Wii but needed something for the bedroom also. Bought this, so far no complaints
customer_reviews.author: SPINMASTER KA

customer_reviews.title: It works okay not great but if you are patient its good for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works okay not great but if you are patient its good for the price. Do the software updates and you will have a be
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: if  you don't have or cant afford a smart tv this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: Great item very good price fast shipping easy to setup works with any tv great picture and sound! I brought one and had to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: undagreez2012

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I love the variety of apps available. I connected it to my kitchen TV which does not have satellite. I use the player almost every day. I also love the portability of the player. It's so easy to take to another TV. The start up (searching for the wireless connection) each time takes a few minutes, but once it connects, the streaming is excellent, actually better than my Panasonic blue-ray dvd player.
customer_reviews.author: eeloie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It took me while to decide which media player to get, order this one plays almost all common file format attached with sony hx-800 3d tv plays mkv as 3d need to adjust 3d fuction manually from tv not hard ,in built wifi is great, doesnt take long to play selected file few seconds,only i gave 4 star because it doesnt play mov. files from my kodak play Sport but still have trust in sony will release updates for more formats not in hurry.look, quality,sound,operate all 5 star.love this product compare to other media product price is decent too.attached with toshiba external hard drive 640gb works great.attached with bose t20 home theater it rocks.DLNA works fine.
customer_reviews.author: harpi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to. I watch my guitar lessons via my computer and so I can watch on my TV. This product is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony media box
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderfully easy to use media streamer.No problems easy hook up and use.I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hofmann

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last.
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first, but wore out after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Sony
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago and love it. Not sure why Sony stopped making these. Still highly recommend. EricShirk.com
customer_reviews.author: John Pbody

customer_reviews.title: Good by cable bill!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of paying outrageous cable bills but, antennae TV wasn't gonna give me enough choices. So I bought this product for $50.00 or so, and I could not be happier. Now I pay $8.00 a month for Netflix and I have MORE than enough movies and documentaries to watch!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Sony smp-n200 streaming media player
customer_reviews.text: Works well. picks up internet wirelessly better than my TV and Blue ray players do. Sometimes a little glitchy but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Convenient. Good for pulling content from computer
customer_reviews.text: Convenient. Good for pulling content from computer. I do not like that it does not read all type of formats. You wont be able to watch all library.
customer_reviews.author: Raul barrera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for me. It didn't come with a remote like it said but I did live chat with Sony and got a free replacement remote. They send me 2 on accident. The price for the remote would of been $45...crazy!!!...but all you gotta do is say you bought it online and the remote was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Bought so I could try Amazon Prime Video
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well. The keyboard screen sucks, but I don't ever use it anyway. I did find that by using my Samsung Galaxy S3 as a remote for it, the keyboard feature on the phone works much easier, but again, I never really have any need for it. I did use it once for Pandora, and then later when I went to sign in again, the Pandora code was gone, and now I can't get it back. Have tried everything I can think of, but no use. The main thing I view on it is Amazon Prime, so no big loss there.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device for streaming
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this device for a month and it performs as it claims. Easy installation no problems. I stream avi./mkv. format movies from my pc to an HDTV. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, if you can get it to work.
customer_reviews.text: 1st of all. Sony is TERRIBLE with their directions.. Yes, you can set this up super fast.. If all your doing is netflix and hulu type subscription services.. But if you want to connect to your pc, your going to have problems.. Media player wouldn't update new movies to send to the unit.. We had to download a 3rd party DLNA server to get all content on the computer to play on the device. No tech support from Sony.. Now that we have that in place, it works fine...
customer_reviews.author: Timothy E.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a really cool media player performs very well and is real easy to set up.

customer_reviews.title: Oh Ya !!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Works great. Use it all the time. No problems so far. Great apps. Would highly recommend. Anybody should get this.
customer_reviews.author: Jahomba

customer_reviews.title: It works Great even when it is used!
customer_reviews.text: It put the net on the tip of my fingers! Excelent! I Paid only half of the price on this Sony SMP!!!
customer_reviews.author: jesus diaz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ADDITION
customer_reviews.text: Great gadget for netflix etc. No need to spend more for a game box. Price was great and received quickly and without damage
customer_reviews.author: P. V. Patrick

customer_reviews.text: It's a awesome media player great price and with all the features you can't go wrong great for the whole family :-)
customer_reviews.author: Heatherm_333

customer_reviews.title: Streaming media delight!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say how much I LOVE this streaming media player. It is small and versatile and was out of the box and streaming Netflix and Hulu Plus in about 10 minutes... tops! The choice of streaming option is great with Netflix, Hulu Plus, Amazon Instant Video (including Amazon Prime), Vudu, Pandora, Slacker, Youtube and more. I highly recommend this product if you want to get rid of your high cable bill. Even streaming wirelessly has no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Garza

customer_reviews.title: Here is my updated review: it stopped working after ...
customer_reviews.text: Here is my updated review: it stopped working after 2 years. I have no idea what happened since I do not use it much. Ok to display videos on the local network but for Internet content a nightmare. It freezes every 30 seconds. So, avoid it and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to love!
customer_reviews.text: Turn your HDTV into a smart HDTV and save hundreds on the upgrade. Worth every penny. Picture quality is great and the sound is awesome, too

customer_reviews.title: sony SMP-N200
customer_reviews.text: My streaming player is great , really enjoying it. It took about 20 minutes to add for my wifi system, my satisfaction level has been met. Thank You seller for good service and quick shipment.
customer_reviews.author: chuckie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Fast Setup for the device physically. You need to register and go online to several sites you use to activate the service with the device like when you set up a smart tv. However, since I was dead tired and use it to block out noise so I can sleep I went straight to Crackle and found an old tv show that ran all night without needed to interact for each episode like annoying netfflix and sleep like a log. Now I can do all the tech registering and open up all content including my local network.
customer_reviews.author: Teri D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is no Playstation 3 but it compares well if you just wanna stream. I have amazon instant video, hulu, and netflix. Perfect solution to no cable. I love it.

customer_reviews.text: this unit seems to have a modified version of the sony bravia menu system. ease of use and simple navigation, lan access to shared media is a plus. took quite a while for delivery. guess pony express did a sleep-over for a week or two...

product_meta.title: Sony SMP-N200 Streaming Media Player with Wi-Fi
product_meta.description:
Turn your TV into a smart TV and enjoy wireless access to popular apps like Netflix, HuluPlus, YouTube, Pandora, and Crackle.1 Stream your favorite movies, TV shows, music and more, even in full HD2 and 3D3. Control it all with a simple smartphone app for iPhone and Android.4.Power Requirements: 110 to 240V 50Hz/60Hz, Consumption: 11W.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

SONY SMP-N200 STREAMING MEDIA PLAYER WITH WI-FI

 * Built-in Wi-Fi
   
 * 
 * Full HD 1080p with HDMI output 
 * 
 * Stream 3D and High Definition Video
   
 * 
 * Multi-room Audio with Sony Homeshare
   
 * 
 * iPhone/iPod touch and Android Phone Remote Control
   
 * USB Input
   
 * I/P Noise Reduction
   
 * 
















Turn your TV into a smart TV and enjoy wireless access to popular apps like Netflix, HuluPlus, YouTube, Pandora, and Crackle. You can also stream your favorite movies, TV shows, music and more, even in full HD2 and 3D3 . Control it all with a simple smartphone app for iPhone and Android.



KEY FEATURES

SMART TV

Get instant access to thousands of hit movies, TV shows, music choices, and online videos.1 Plus get new apps delivered to you automatically, so your selection is never outdated and you are always connected to the best entertainment.


BUILT-IN WI-FI

The SMP-N200 doesn’t require messy network cables to deliver content to your TV or audio system, provided you have a working Wi-Fi network in your home. Conno system, pro your home's wireless broadband network, and go.


FULL HD 1080P WITH HDMI OUTPUT
Enjoy up to Full HD 1080p video quality, with a simple, one-cable HDMI connection to your HDTV.2 A perfect solution to conveniently add multimedia streaming to any HDMI equipped HDTV. The SMP-N200 also has HDMI 6 composite and component audio/ video outputs, providing the ability to play streamed content on any television you may own.

STREAM 3D AND HIGH DEFINITION VIDEO
The SMP-N200 has the ability to stream from 3D and high definition video sources, allowing you to take advantage of everything your 3D HDTV has to offer 2. You can also stream music, videos and photos from DLNA compatible devices (like a Windows 7 PC) using your home network. 
MULTI-ROOM AUDIO WITH SONY HOMESHARE
Enjoy Pandora, Slacker, your MP3s and other available audio in another room, in the garage— wherever your home wireless network can reach. Simply link the SMP-N200 to Sony HomeShare™ network speakers, and your music can flow throughout your home.

IPHONE/IPOD TOUCH AND ANDROID PHONE REMOTE CONTROL
Download the free Media Remote app to your iPhone, iPod touch or compatible Android phone and turn it into a versatile remote - access movie info, search entertainment topics and more.4

USB INPUT
Share your videos or photos on the big screen or listen to your favorite music. Simply connect your digital camera, USB-enabled MP3 player, or USB storage device to play a wide variety of file formats.

I/P NOISE REDUCTION
Improve the picture quality of Internet entertainment and enjoy crisp, clear images on your HDTV. 
 * 
 * 

PRODUCT DIMENSIONS
Video: Upscaling: Yes (Precision CinemaHD Upscaler)
Inputs and Outputs:
USB Port: 1-side
Weight and Measurements:
Approx: 5.9 in. x 1.7 in. x 5.9 in.
WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * 
 * AC Cable
   
 * AV Cable
 * Button Battery (CR2032)
   
 * Remote RMTD302
   
 *
